mapper.sql: select customer_id, record_date, company_code, area, record_code, owner_user_id, name, project_ame, contact_name, contact_position, contact_phone, contact_email, brand, info, product_info, remark, status, del_flag, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time,area_code,source,record_type,record_num,telephone,fax,company_address,dept_id, customer_level,code_name,industry_division,allocation_date,assign_number,file_number,file_paths,new_status, string1,string2,string3,string4,string5,string6,string7,string8,string9,string10, string11,string12,string13,string14,string15,string16,string17,string18,string19,string20 from biz_customer

select c.customer_id, c.record_date, c.company_code, c.area, c.record_code, u.user_name as owner_user_id, c.name, c.project_ame, c.contact_name, c.contact_position, c.contact_phone, c.contact_email, c.brand, c.info, c.product_info, c.remark, c.status, c.del_flag, c.create_by, c.create_time, c.update_by, c.update_time, c.area_code,c.source,c.record_type,c.record_num,c.telephone,c.fax,c.company_address,c.dept_id,dt.dept_name deptName, c.customer_level,c.code_name,c.industry_division,c.allocation_date,c.assign_number,c.file_number,c.file_paths,c.new_status, ad.code_name as areaCodeName,c.string1,c.string2,c.string3,c.string4,c.string5,c.string6,c.string7,c.string8,c.string9,c.string10, c.string11,c.string12,c.string13,c.string14,c.string15,c.string16,c.string17,c.string18,c.string19,c.string20
from biz_customer c left join sys_user u on c.owner_user_id=u.user_id
left join sys_dept dt on u.dept_id=dt.dept_id
left join sys_dict_data dd on dd.dict_type='customer_area' and dd.dict_value=c.area
left join biz_area_dict ad on ad.area=dd.dict_label
where c.del_flag = '0'
${params.dataScope}

select c.customer_id, c.record_date, c.company_code, c.area, c.record_code, u.user_name as owner_user_id, c.name, c.project_ame, c.contact_name, c.contact_position, c.contact_phone, c.contact_email, c.brand, c.info, c.product_info, c.remark, c.status, c.del_flag, c.create_by, c.create_time, c.update_by, c.update_time, c.area_code,c.source,c.record_type,c.record_num,c.telephone,c.fax,c.company_address,c.dept_id,dt.dept_name deptName, c.customer_level,c.code_name,c.industry_division,c.allocation_date,c.assign_number,c.file_number,c.file_paths,c.new_status, ad.code_name as areaCodeName,c.string1,c.string2,c.string3,c.string4,c.string5,c.string6,c.string7,c.string8,c.string9,c.string10, c.string11,c.string12,c.string13,c.string14,c.string15,c.string16,c.string17,c.string18,c.string19,c.string20
from biz_customer c left join sys_user u on c.owner_user_id=u.user_id
left join sys_dept dt on u.dept_id=dt.dept_id
left join sys_dict_data dd on dd.dict_type='customer_area' and dd.dict_value=c.area
left join biz_area_dict ad on ad.area=dd.dict_label
where c.del_flag = '0' and c.owner_user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert:
insert into biz_customer
record_date, company_code, area, record_code, owner_user_id, name, project_ame, contact_name, contact_position, contact_phone, contact_email, brand, info, product_info, remark, status, del_flag, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time,
area_code, source, record_type, record_num, telephone, fax, company_address, dept_id,
customer_level, code_name, industry_division, allocation_date, assign_number, file_number, file_paths, new_status,
string1, string2, string3, string4, string5, string6, string7, string8, string9, string10,
string11, string12, string13, string14, string15, string16, string17, string18, string19, string20,
#{recordDate}, #{companyCode}, #{area}, #{recordCode}, #{ownerUserId}, #{name}, #{projectAme}, #{contactName}, #{contactPosition}, #{contactPhone}, #{contactEmail}, #{brand}, #{info}, #{productInfo}, #{remark}, #{status}, #{delFlag}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{updateBy}, #{updateTime},
#{areaCode}, #{source}, #{recordType}, #{recordNum}, #{telephone}, #{fax}, #{companyAddress}, #{deptId},
#{customerLevel}, #{codeName}, #{industryDivision}, #{allocationDate}, #{assignNumber}, #{fileNumber}, #{filePaths}, #{newStatus},
#{string1}, #{string2}, #{string3}, #{string4}, #{string5}, #{string6}, #{string7}, #{string8}, #{string9}, #{string10},
#{string11}, #{string12}, #{string13}, #{string14}, #{string15}, #{string16}, #{string17}, #{string18}, #{string19}, #{string20},
mapper.update:
update biz_customer
record_date = #{recordDate}, company_code = #{companyCode}, area = #{area}, record_code = #{recordCode}, owner_user_id = #{ownerUserId}, name = #{name}, project_ame = #{projectAme}, contact_name = #{contactName}, contact_position = #{contactPosition}, contact_phone = #{contactPhone}, contact_email = #{contactEmail}, brand = #{brand}, info = #{info}, product_info = #{productInfo}, remark = #{remark}, status = #{status}, del_flag = #{delFlag}, create_by = #{createBy}, create_time = #{createTime}, update_by = #{updateBy}, update_time = #{updateTime},
area_code = #{areaCode}, source = #{source}, record_type = #{recordType}, record_num = #{recordNum}, telephone = #{telephone}, fax = #{fax}, company_address = #{companyAddress}, dept_id = #{deptId},
customer_level = #{customerLevel}, code_name = #{codeName}, industry_division = #{industryDivision}, allocation_date = #{allocationDate}, assign_number = #{assignNumber}, file_number = #{fileNumber}, file_paths = #{filePaths}, new_status = #{newStatus},
string1 = #{string1}, string2 = #{string2}, string3 = #{string3}, string4 = #{string4}, string5 = #{string5}, string6 = #{string6}, string7 = #{string7}, string8 = #{string8}, string9 = #{string9}, string10 = #{string10},
string11 = #{string11}, string12 = #{string12}, string13 = #{string13}, string14 = #{string14}, string15 = #{string15}, string16 = #{string16}, string17 = #{string17}, string18 = #{string18}, string19 = #{string19}, string20 = #{string20},
where customer_id = #{customerId}
mapper.delete:
delete from biz_customer where customer_id in
#{customerId}
mapper.select: select (max(CONVERT(right(file_number,4),UNSIGNED INTEGER)) + 1) as fileNumber from biz_customer where file_number is not null and file_number like concat('HL-',YEAR(NOW()),'-%') and length(file_number)=12
